title: Team Young, (amateur team competing in OOL). Require Top, Jg and ADC. (Plat 2+).
body:
Hello there,

Team Young is a newly found team that are seeking dedicated players that have a good attitude, availability and skill.
We put priority over players with past experience and a player that stands out.

Applicants below Plat 2 will be considered and looked at, but higher ranks would be preferred.  An exception to players that have placed in Diamond in season 6.

What Team Young has to offer:
Strong Individual skill
Collaboration
Coaching
Schedule
Good Comms

Please keep in mind that if you are unavailable to attend the Oceanic Open Ladder there is no point in putting through an applicant as the goal of the team is to climb as high as we can during the tournament.

If interested add me on league 'Eatsometimtam' and hopefully you can become part of the player roster for Team Young.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
Team is worth having a look at. 
I use to play with a few of these guys for fun and it's a really welcoming gaming environment.
